attributes.additional_details:
CMS in the U.K. is hugely unfair where fathers are spending a significant amount of time with the child and financially supporting the child in this time, then also paying CMS towards the upbringing of the child. 

In my personal example, I have my child almost 40% of the time and financially provide everything in this time, yet am still expected to pay my ex partner a significant amount of maintenance. 

Make the parents who don't step up pay, but don't punish those of us who do!
attributes.background:
Review the CMS system in the U.K. which is unfair towards the "non-resident" parents. 

Many of us "non-resident" parents are happy to support our children in a reasonable and fair way but the current system for calculation of payment is hugely unfair and is being abused in a huge number of cases

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about how child maintenance is calculated, but we're not sure exactly what action you'd like to see.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you'd like child maintenance to be calculated.
